function.name: communicate_with_team
function.description: Request help from other agents when unable to complete a task. Give a detailed description of what is needed.

message.description: A detailed description of what is needed from other agents.

function.name: communicate_with_agent
function.description: Request help from another agent when unable to complete a task. Give a detailed description of what is needed from the agent. Here are the other agents and their proficiencies: {{AGENT_PROFICIENCIES_PLACEHOLDER}}

agent.description: Name of the agent you need help from.

message.description: A detailed description of what is needed from other agents.

function.name: finish
function.description: You MUST call this tool to end your task. Use this when all steps have been completed or if execution should stop.

message.description: A summary of what was accomplished, what information was collected, any final decisions made, why execution is ending, and any unresolved tasks.
